Olpaka is a powerful and intuitive frontend application designed to help you interact seamlessly with AI models powered by Ollama.

Whether you're a developer, data scientist, or just curious about AI, Olpaka provides an easy-to-use interface to load, manage, and interact with various AI models.

With Olpaka, harnessing the power of AI has never been easier. Let’s get started on this exciting journey!
To get started, you'll need to download and install Ollama.
To allow Olpaka to communicate with Ollama, you'll need to setup CORS.
Once you've configured CORS, you can check whether Olpaka is able to communicate with Olpaka by using the button below.
If it still doesn't work try to restart Ollama before continuing.
